com.cloudbees.plugins.flow.BuildFlow.description: Flow description for the Rock release: <%= flavor %>
com.cloudbees.plugins.flow.BuildFlow.dsl:
build("0_cleanup-ruby-package-repository", release: "<%= flavor %>") build("0_cleanup-rock-package-repository", release: "<%= flavor %>")
<% flow[:gems].each_with_index do |gem,i| %> retry(3) { build("0_cleanup-package", release: "<%= flavor %>", package: "<%= gem%>") <% version = flow[:gem_versions][gem] || "noversion" %> build("<%= gem%>", release: "<%= flavor %>", package_version: "<%= version.encode(:xml => :text) %>") } <% end %>
<% flow[:packages].each_with_index do |job,i| %> retry(3) { build("0_cleanup-package", release: "<%= flavor %>", package: "<%= job.sub("rock-","")%>") build("<%= job %>", release: "<%= flavor %>") } <% end %>
